front.title: TCP Mapping for Reliable Server Pooling Failover Mode

abstract.t: This memo defines the shim protocol that maps the requirements of theASAP protocol [5] to the capabilities of the TCP protocol [7]. Inparticular, this shim protocol adds the following capabiltiies thatare required by ASAP, but not provided by TCP: (1) messageorientation, (2) heartbeat messages, (3) undelivered messageretrieval, and (4) multiple streams.
